S
urgical management of a ruptured ectopic pregnancy 
• D
o adequate fluid resuscitation on the way to theatre, but do not delay surgery to try and correct the fluid
balance first- see anaesthetic notes below. The woman is bleeding actively and unless you stop the bleeding
surgically, she will die.
